mapper.select: SELECT A.user_code, A.id, A.name user_name, A.connection_date, A.creation_date, A.withdraw_state, C.name authority_name, D.commit_date FROM tbl_user A JOIN tbl_authority_list B ON A.user_code = B.user_code JOIN tbl_authority C ON B.authority_code = C.authority_code LEFT JOIN tbl_withdraw D ON A.user_code = D.user_code WHERE A.classify='관리자' ORDER BY C.name='ADMIN', A.withdraw_state='Y', A.connection_date DESC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_user(id, password, classify, name, creation_date) VALUES (#{adminAddId}, #{adminAddPass}, '관리자', #{adminAddName}, NOW())
